Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 18th overall pick, by San Francisco in 1970...
Traded from San Francisco to Chicago (N) on 2/13/1970 (Going to SF: 3B M. Pierce. Going to CHC: P D. Downs)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to New York (A) on 4/18/1970 (Going to CHC: 1B J. Pepitone. Going to NYY: SS R. Burleson, LF R. Severson, P D. Downs)...
Injured on 8/25/1971 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 8/17/1973 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 6/27/1976...
Injured on 9/19/1976 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for full season...
Won World Series with New York (A) in 1976...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/30/1978, winning 2 games with a 0.50 ERA...
Injured on 4/4/1979 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1980, winning 2 games with a 0.57 ERA...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/2/1980 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Won World Series with New York (A) in 1980...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1984, winning 2 games with a 2.04 ERA...
Injured on 6/3/1987 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 5/11/1988 with a Tender Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 4/18/1989 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/25/1990 to a 2-year deal worth $2,510,000 per year...
